00030 #include "wizard.h"
00031 
00032 void Wizard::loadThemeIcons(QString themePath, int Scene){
00033     QPixmap pixmap;
00034 
00035     switch (Scene){
00036     case 0:
00037         // Prefix creation
00038         if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/prefixc.png").arg(themePath))){
00039             pixmap.load(":data/prefixc.png");
00040         }
00041 
00042         lblPicture->setPixmap(pixmap);
00043 
00044 
00045         cmdGetWineBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00046         cmdGetWineServerBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00047         cmdGetWineLoaderBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00048         cmdGetWineDllPath->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00049 
00050         cmdGetPrefixPath->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00051         cmdGetMountPoint->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00052 
00053         break;
00054     case 1:
00055         // First startup
00056         if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/firstc.png").arg(themePath))){
00057             pixmap.load(":data/firstc.png");
00058         }
00059 
00060         lblPicture->setPixmap(pixmap);
00061 
00062         cmdGetWineBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00063         cmdGetWineServerBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00064         cmdGetWineLoaderBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00065         cmdGetWineDllPath->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00066 
00067         cmdGetTarBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00068         cmdGetMountBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00069         cmdGetUmountBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00070         cmdGetSudoBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00071         cmdGetGuiSudoBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00072         cmdGetNiceBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00073         cmdGetReniceBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00074         cmdGetShBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00075 
00076         cmdGetConsoleBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00077         cmdGetWrestoolBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00078         cmdGetIcotoolBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00079 
00080 #ifdef WITHOUT_ICOTOOLS
00081         cmdGetWrestoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00082         cmdGetIcotoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00083         txtWrestoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00084         txtIcotoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00085 #endif
00086 
00087         break;
00088     case 2:
00089         // Fake drive
00090         if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/firstc.png").arg(themePath))){
00091             pixmap.load(":data/firstc.png");
00092         }
00093         lblPicture->setPixmap(pixmap);
00094         break;
00095     case 3:
00096         // Fake drive
00097         if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/firstc.png").arg(themePath))){
00098             pixmap.load(":data/firstc.png");
00099         }
00100         lblPicture->setPixmap(pixmap);
00101         break;
00102     }
00103     return;
00104 }

00106 
00107 QIcon Wizard::loadIcon(QString iconName, QString themePath){
00108     // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
00109     // If it fails -> load default from rsource file
00110 
00111     QIcon icon;
00112 
00113     if ((!themePath.isEmpty()) and (themePath!="Default")){
00114         icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(themePath).arg(iconName));
00115         if (icon.isNull()){
00116             icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00117         }
00118     } else {
00119         icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00120     }
00121 
00122     return icon;
00123 }

00127 Wizard::Wizard(int WizardType, QString var1, QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00128 {
00129     /*
00130         Note: var1 is optional data, used for different scene actions ;)
00131     */
00132 
00133     setupUi(this);
00134 
00135     // Loading libq4wine-core.so
00136     libq4wine.setFileName("libq4wine-core");
00137 
00138     if (!libq4wine.load()){
00139         libq4wine.load();
00140     }
00141 
00142     // Getting corelib calss pointer
00143     CoreLibClassPointer = (CoreLibPrototype *) libq4wine.resolve("createCoreLib");
00144     CoreLib = (corelib *)CoreLibClassPointer(true);
00145 
00146     // Creating database classes
00147     db_prefix = new Prefix();
00148     db_icon = new Icon();
00149     db_dir = new Dir();
00150 
00151     widgetCreatePrefix0->setVisible(FALSE);
00152 
00153     Scena=WizardType;
00154     Page=1;
00155     QString console_w;
00156 
00157     loadThemeIcons(CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString(), Scena);
00158 
00159 
00160     switch (Scena){
00161     case 0:
00162         TotalPage=5;
00163 
00164         setWindowTitle(tr("New prefix creation wizard"));
00165         lblCaption->setText(tr("<b>Prefix creation wizard</b>"));
00166         lblStep->setText(tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00167 
00168         connect (cbCreafeFake, SIGNAL(stateChanged (int)), this, SLOT(changeBoxState(int)));
00169 
00170         cmdGetPrefixPath->installEventFilter(this);
00171         cmdGetWineBin->installEventFilter(this);
00172         cmdGetWineServerBin->installEventFilter(this);
00173         cmdGetWineLoaderBin->installEventFilter(this);
00174         cmdGetWineDllPath->installEventFilter(this);
00175         cmdGetMountPoint->installEventFilter(this);
00176 
00177         combSourceDevice->addItems(CoreLib->getCdromDevices());
00178         break;
00179     case 1:
00180         TotalPage=7;
00181 
00182         setWindowTitle(tr("First startup wizard"));
00183         lblCaption->setText(tr("<b>First startup wizard</b>"));
00184         lblStep->setText(tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00185 
00186         cmdGetWineBin->installEventFilter(this);
00187         cmdGetWineServerBin->installEventFilter(this);
00188         cmdGetWineLoaderBin->installEventFilter(this);
00189         cmdGetWineDllPath->installEventFilter(this);
00190 
00191         cmdGetTarBin->installEventFilter(this);
00192         cmdGetMountBin->installEventFilter(this);
00193         cmdGetUmountBin->installEventFilter(this);
00194         cmdGetSudoBin->installEventFilter(this);
00195         cmdGetGuiSudoBin->installEventFilter(this);
00196         cmdGetNiceBin->installEventFilter(this);
00197         cmdGetReniceBin->installEventFilter(this);
00198         cmdGetShBin->installEventFilter(this);
00199 
00200         cmdGetConsoleBin->installEventFilter(this);
00201         cmdGetWrestoolBin->installEventFilter(this);
00202         cmdGetIcotoolBin->installEventFilter(this);
00203 
00204         txtWineBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("wine"));
00205         txtWineServerBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("wineserver"));
00206         txtWineLoaderBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("wine"));
00207 
00208         if (QDir("/usr/lib/wine").exists())
00209             txtWineDllPath->setText("/usr/lib/wine");
00210 
00211         if (QDir("/local/usr/lib/wine").exists())
00212             txtWineDllPath->setText("/local/usr/lib/wine");
00213 
00214         if (QDir("/usr/local/lib/wine").exists())
00215             txtWineDllPath->setText("/usr/local/lib/wine");
00216 
00217         txtTarBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("tar"));
00218         txtMountBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("mount"));
00219         txtUmountBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("umount"));
00220         txtSudoBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("sudo"));
00221 
00222         txtGuiSudoBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("kdesu"));
00223         if (txtGuiSudoBin->text().isEmpty()){
00224             txtGuiSudoBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("gksu"));
00225         } else {
00226             if (txtGuiSudoBin->text().isEmpty()){
00227                 txtGuiSudoBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("sudo"));
00228             }
00229         }
00230 
00231         txtNiceBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("nice"));
00232         txtReniceBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("renice"));
00233         txtShBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("sh"));
00234 
00235         console_w = CoreLib->getWhichOut("konsole");
00236         if (!console_w.isEmpty()){
00237             txtConsoleBin->setText(console_w);
00238             txtConsoleArgs->setText("--noclose -e");
00239         } else {
00240             console_w = CoreLib->getWhichOut("xterm");
00241             if (!console_w.isEmpty()){
00242                 txtConsoleBin->setText(console_w);
00243                 txtConsoleArgs->setText("-e");
00244             }
00245         }
00246 
00247 #ifndef WITHOUT_ICOTOOLS
00248         txtWrestoolBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("wrestool"));
00249         txtIcotoolBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("icotool"));
00250 #endif
00251 
00252         break;
00253     case 2:
00254         TotalPage=6;
00255         this->var1=var1;
00256         setWindowTitle(tr("Fake drive creation wizard"));
00257         lblCaption->setText(tr("<b>Fake drive creation wizard</b>"));
00258         lblStep->setText(tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00259         lblWizardInfo->setText(Wizard::tr("<p>Welcome to fake drive creation wizard.</p><p>This wizard helps you to make all necessary steps for successful fake drive creation.</p><p>Please, press the <b>Next</b> button to go to the next wizard's page. Or press <b>Back</b> button for return.</p>"));
00260         break;
00261     case 3:
00262         TotalPage=6;
00263         this->var1=var1;
00264         setWindowTitle(tr("Fake drive update wizard"));
00265         lblCaption->setText(tr("<b>Fake drive update wizard</b>"));
00266         lblStep->setText(tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00267         lblWizardInfo->setText(Wizard::tr("<p>Welcome to fake drive update wizard.</p><p>This wizard helps you to make all necessary steps for successful fake drive creation.</p><p>Please, press the <b>Next</b> button to go to the next wizard's page. Or press <b>Back</b> button for return.</p>"));
00268         Scena=2;
00269         break;
00270     }
00271 
00272     connect(cmdCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(reject ()));
00273     connect(cmdNext, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(nextWizardPage()));
00274     connect(cmdBack, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(previosWizardPage()));
00275 
00276     connect(comboProxyType, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(QString)), this, SLOT(comboProxyType_indexChanged(QString)));
00277 
00278     widgetCreatePrefix0->setVisible(FALSE);
00279     widgetCreatePrefix1->setVisible(FALSE);
00280     widgetCreatePrefix2->setVisible(FALSE);
00281 
00282     widgetCreateFakeDrive0->setVisible(FALSE);
00283     widgetCreateFakeDrive1->setVisible(FALSE);
00284     widgetCreateFakeDrive2->setVisible(FALSE);
00285     widgetCreateFakeDrive3->setVisible(FALSE);
00286 
00287     widgetFirstStartup0->setVisible(FALSE);
00288     widgetFirstStartup1->setVisible(FALSE);
00289     widgetFirstStartup2->setVisible(FALSE);
00290     widgetFirstStartup3->setVisible(FALSE);
00291 
00292     widgetInfo->setVisible(FALSE);
00293 
00294     updateScena();
00295 
00296     this->installEventFilter(this);
00297 
00298     return;
00299 }

00301 
00302 void Wizard::comboProxyType_indexChanged(QString text){
00303     if (text==tr("No Proxy")){
00304         txtProxyHost->setEnabled(FALSE);
00305         txtProxyPort->setEnabled(FALSE);
00306         txtProxyUser->setEnabled(FALSE);
00307         txtProxyPass->setEnabled(FALSE);
00308     } else {
00309         txtProxyHost->setEnabled(TRUE);
00310         txtProxyPort->setEnabled(TRUE);
00311         txtProxyUser->setEnabled(TRUE);
00312         txtProxyPass->setEnabled(TRUE);
00313     }
00314 
00315     return;
00316 }

00332                     }
00333                 break;
00334             }
00335         break;
00336     }
00337     */
00338 
00339     return;
00340 }
00341 
00342 bool Wizard::eventFilter(QObject *obj, QEvent *event){
00343     /*
00344         User select folder dialog function
00345     */
00346     if (this->widgetFrame->width()<=100)
00347         return FALSE;
00348 
00349     if (event->type() == QEvent::Resize){
00350         this->widgetInfo->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00351         this->widgetCreateFakeDrive0->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00352         this->widgetCreateFakeDrive1->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00353         this->widgetCreateFakeDrive2->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00354         this->widgetCreateFakeDrive3->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00355         this->widgetCreatePrefix0->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00356         this->widgetCreatePrefix1->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00357         this->widgetCreatePrefix2->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00358         this->widgetFirstStartup0->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00359         this->widgetFirstStartup1->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00360         this->widgetFirstStartup2->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00361         this->widgetFirstStartup3->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00362         return TRUE;
00363     }
00364 
00365     if (obj->objectName()== "Wizard")
00366         return FALSE;
00367 
00368     if (event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonPress) {
00369         QString file;
00370         if (obj->objectName().right(3)=="Bin"){
00371             file = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open File"), QDir::homePath(),   "All files (*)");
00372         } else {
00373             file = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Open Directory"), QDir::homePath(),   QFileDialog::DontResolveSymlinks);
00374         }
00375 
00376         if (!file.isEmpty()){
00377             QString a;
00378             a.append("txt");
00379             a.append(obj->objectName().right(obj->objectName().length()-6));
00380 
00381             QLineEdit *lineEdit = findChild<QLineEdit *>(a);
00382             if (lineEdit){
00383                 lineEdit->setText(file);
00384             } else {
00385                 qDebug("Error");
00386             }
00387             if (obj==cmdGetWineBin){
00388                 QString wrkDir;
00389                 QStringList list1 = file.split("/");
00390                 wrkDir = file.left(file.length() - list1.last().length());
00391                 txtWineServerBin->setText(tr("%1wineserver").arg(wrkDir));
00392                 txtWineLoaderBin->setText(tr("%1wine").arg(wrkDir));
00393             }
00394         }
00395     }
00396     return FALSE;
00397 }
00398 
00399 bool Wizard::checkEntry(QString fileName, QString info, bool isFile){
00400     /*
00401      *  This function check user entry
00402      */
00403 
00404     if (fileName.isEmpty()){
00405         switch (isFile){
00406         case FALSE:
00407             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify %1 directory.").arg(info));
00408             break;
00409         case TRUE:
00410             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify %1 binary.").arg(info));
00411             break;
00412         }
00413         return FALSE;
00414     } else {
00415         if (!QFile::exists(fileName)){
00416             switch (isFile){
00417             case FALSE:
00418                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specified %1 directory not exists.").arg(info));
00419                 break;
00420             case TRUE:
00421                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specified %1 binary not exists.").arg(info));
00422                 break;
00423             }
00424             return FALSE;
00425         }
00426     }
00427 
00428     return TRUE;
00429 }
00430 
00431 void Wizard::nextWizardPage(){
00432     /*
00433         Function for processing next\finish button click events
00434     */
00435     switch(Scena){
00436     case 1:
00437         switch (Page){
00438                 case 3:
00439             if (!checkEntry(txtWineBin->text(), "wine"))
00440                 return;
00441             if (!checkEntry(txtWineServerBin->text(), "wine server"))
00442                 return;
00443             if (!checkEntry(txtWineLoaderBin->text(), "wine loader"))
00444                 return;
00445             if (!checkEntry(txtWineDllPath->text(), "wine library", FALSE))
00446                 return;
00447             break;
00448                 case 4:
00449             if (!checkEntry(txtTarBin->text(), "tar"))
00450                 return;
00451             if (!checkEntry(txtMountBin->text(), "mount"))
00452                 return;
00453             if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "umount"))
00454                 return;
00455             if (!checkEntry(txtSudoBin->text(), "sudo"))
00456                 return;
00457             if (!checkEntry(txtGuiSudoBin->text(), "GUI sudo"))
00458                 return;
00459             if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "nice"))
00460                 return;
00461             if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "renice"))
00462                 return;
00463             if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "sh"))
00464                 return;
00465             break;
00466                 case 5:
00467             if (!checkEntry(txtConsoleBin->text(), "console"))
00468                 return;
00469 #ifndef WITHOUT_ICOTOOLS
00470             if (!checkEntry(txtWrestoolBin->text(), "wrestool"))
00471                 return;
00472             if (!checkEntry(txtIcotoolBin->text(), "icotool"))
00473                 return;
00474 #endif
00475             break;
00476                 case 6:
00477             if (comboProxyType->currentText()!=tr("No Proxy")){
00478                 if (txtProxyHost->text().isEmpty()){
00479                     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify proxy host."));
00480                     return;
00481                 }
00482                 if (txtProxyPort->text().isEmpty()){
00483                     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify proxy port."));
00484                     return;
00485                 }
00486             }
00487             break;
00488                 case 7:
00489             QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00490             settings.beginGroup("wine");
00491             settings.setValue("WineBin", txtWineBin->text());
00492             settings.setValue("ServerBin", txtWineServerBin->text());
00493             settings.setValue("LoaderBin", txtWineLoaderBin->text());
00494             settings.setValue("WineLibs", txtWineDllPath->text());
00495             settings.endGroup();
00496             settings.beginGroup("system");
00497             settings.setValue("tar", txtTarBin->text());
00498             settings.setValue("mount", txtMountBin->text());
00499             settings.setValue("umount", txtUmountBin->text());
00500             settings.setValue("sudo", txtSudoBin->text());
00501             settings.setValue("gui_sudo", txtGuiSudoBin->text());
00502             settings.setValue("nice", txtNiceBin->text());
00503             settings.setValue("renice", txtReniceBin->text());
00504             settings.setValue("sh", txtShBin->text());
00505             settings.endGroup();
00506             settings.beginGroup("console");
00507             settings.setValue("bin", txtConsoleBin->text());
00508             settings.setValue("args", txtConsoleArgs->text());
00509             settings.endGroup();
00510             settings.beginGroup("icotool");
00511             settings.setValue("wrestool", txtWrestoolBin->text());
00512             settings.setValue("icotool", txtIcotoolBin->text());
00513             settings.endGroup();
00514             settings.beginGroup("network");
00515             settings.setValue("host", txtProxyHost->text());
00516             settings.setValue("post", txtProxyPort->text());
00517             settings.setValue("user", txtProxyUser->text());
00518             settings.setValue("pass", txtProxyPass->text());
00519 
00520             if (comboProxyType->currentText()==tr("No Proxy")){
00521                 settings.setValue("type", 0);
00522             } else {
00523                 if (comboProxyType->currentText()=="HTTP"){
00524                     settings.setValue("type", 1);
00525                 } else {
00526                     settings.setValue("type", 2);
00527                 }
00528             }
00529 
00530             settings.endGroup();
00531             accept();
00532             break;
00533         }
00534         break;
00535     case 0:
00536         switch (Page){
00537                 case 2:
00538             if (txtPrefixName->text().isEmpty()){
00539                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Enter prefix name first."));
00540                 return;
00541             } else {
00542                 if (db_prefix->isExistsByName(txtPrefixName->text())){
00543                     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry. There is other prefix with same name."));
00544                     return;
00545                 }
00546             }
00547             if (!txtPrefixPath->text().isEmpty()){
00548                 if (!QDir(txtPrefixPath->text()).exists()){
00549                     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, prefix path is wrong! Directory not exists."));
00550                     return;
00551                 }
00552             } else {
00553                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Select prefix directory first."));
00554                 return;
00555             }
00556             break;
00557                 case 4:
00558             if ((txtMountPoint->text().isEmpty()) and (combSourceDevice->currentText()!=tr("<none>"))){
00559                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify mount point directory."));
00560                 return;
00561             }
00562             if ((!txtMountPoint->text().isEmpty()) and (combSourceDevice->currentText()==tr("<none>"))){
00563                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify source device."));
00564                 return;
00565             }
00566             break;
00567                 case 5:
00568             if (!db_prefix->addPrefix(txtPrefixName->text(), txtPrefixPath->text(), txtWineBin->text(), txtWineServerBin->text(), txtWineLoaderBin->text(), txtWineDllPath->text(), txtMountPoint->text(), combSourceDevice->currentText()))
00569                 reject();
00570             if (cbCreafeFake->checkState()==Qt::Checked){
00571                 Wizard *createFakeDriveWizard = new Wizard(2, txtPrefixName->text());
00572                 createFakeDriveWizard->exec();
00573             }
00574             accept();
00575             break;
00576         }
00577         break;
00578     case 2:
00579         switch (Page){
00580                 case 6:
00581             QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::BusyCursor );
00582 
00583             //Set variables
00584             QSqlQuery query;
00585             QString prefix_name = var1;
00586             QString prefix_id;
00587 
00588             //Getting versions

00743                 } else {
00744                     QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00745                     reject();
00746                 }

00750         break;

00753     Page++;

00778 void Wizard::updateScena(){
00779     lblStep->setText(Wizard::tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00780     switch(Scena){
00781             case 1:
00782         /*
00783                 New prefix creation
00784                 */
00785         switch (Page){
00786                     case 1:
00787             lblCaption->setText(Wizard::tr("<b>First startup wizrd</b>"));
00788             lblWizardInfo->setText(Wizard::tr("<p>Welcome to first startup wizard.</p><p>This wizard helps you to make all necessary steps for successful %1 setup.</p><p>Please, press the <b>Next</b> button to go to the next wizard's page. 00791             cmdNext->setEnabled(TRUE);
00792             cmdBack->setEnabled(FALSE);
00793             break;
00794                     case 2:
00795             txtInfo->setText(tr("<p><b><span style='font-weight:600; color:#6495ed;'>%1</span></b> was initially written by Malakhov Alexey aka John Brezerk  [<a href='mailto:brezerk@gmail.com'>brezerk@gmail.com</a>]</p><p>General ideia comes from <b><span style='font-weight:600; color:#6495ed;'>WineTools</span></b> scripts witch was initially written by Frank Hendriksen [<a href='mailto:frank@frankscorner.org'>frank@frankscorner.org</a>]</p><p>It is licensed under the <b><span style='font-weight:600; color:#6495ed;'>GPL v3</span></b>.</p><p>Send comments, bugreports, etc. to [<a href='mailto:brezerk@gmail.com'>brezerk@gmail.com</a>]</p><p><b><span style='font-weight:600; color:#6495ed;'>Note</span></b>: This software comes with absolutely no warranty. 00796             widgetCreatePrefix1->setVisible(FALSE);
00797             widgetInfo->setVisible(FALSE);

00808                     case 4:

00875             }

00898             }
00899             lblWizardInfo->setText(info);
00900             widgetInfo->setVisible(TRUE);
00901             widgetCreatePrefix0->setVisible(FALSE);
00902             widgetCreatePrefix1->setVisible(FALSE);
00903             widgetCreatePrefix2->setVisible(FALSE);
00904             cmdNext->setText(tr("Finish"));
00905             break;
00906         }
00907         break;
00908             case 2:
00909         /*
00910                     New fake drive creation
00911                 */
00912         switch (Page){
00913                     case 1:
00914             widgetCreateFakeDrive0->setVisible(FALSE);
00915             widgetInfo->setVisible(TRUE);
00916             cmdNext->setEnabled(TRUE);
00917             cmdBack->setEnabled(FALSE);
00918             break;
00919                     case 2:
00920             widgetCreateFakeDrive0->setVisible(TRUE);
00921             widgetCreateFakeDrive1->setVisible(FALSE);
00922             widgetInfo->setVisible(FALSE);
00923             cmdNext->setEnabled(TRUE);
00924             cmdBack->setEnabled(TRUE);
00925             cmdNext->setText(tr("Next >"));
00926             break;
00927                     case 3:
00928             widgetCreateFakeDrive0->setVisible(FALSE);
00929             widgetCreateFakeDrive1->setVisible(TRUE);
00930             widgetCreateFakeDrive2->setVisible(FALSE);
00931             break;
00932                     case 4:
00933             widgetCreateFakeDrive1->setVisible(FALSE);
00934             widgetCreateFakeDrive3->setVisible(FALSE);
00935             widgetCreateFakeDrive2->setVisible(TRUE);
00936             break;
00937                     case 5:
00938             widgetCreateFakeDrive2->setVisible(FALSE);
00939             widgetCreateFakeDrive3->setVisible(TRUE);
00940             widgetInfo->setVisible(FALSE);
00941             cmdNext->setText(tr("Next >"));
00942             break;
00943                     case 6:
00944             QString info;
00945             info = tr("<p>All ready for fake drive creation. </p><p>Please, press the <b>Finish</b> button to create facke drive. Or press <b>Back</b> button for return.</p>");
00946             lblWizardInfo->setText(info);
00947             widgetInfo->setVisible(TRUE);
00948             widgetCreateFakeDrive2->setVisible(FALSE);
00949             widgetCreateFakeDrive3->setVisible(FALSE);
00950             cmdNext->setText(tr("Finish"));
00951             break;
00952         }
00953         break;
00954     }
